name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience creating high-performance applications in B2B SaaS across healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and cloud services including **AWS** with a focus on **Lambda**, **ECS**, **Fargate**, and **API Gateway**. Skilled in building **Microservices** and **RESTful APIs**, with strong knowledge in **SQL** and **Data Modelling**.
Proficient in implementing **CI/CD** processes, deploying **Containers**, and ensuring **Production Observability** through automated testing and monitoring. A solid foundation in **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform**, optimizing performance, and leveraging both **Relational** and **Non-Relational Datastores**. Additionally, experienced in developing advanced AI/ML platforms for predictive analytics and automation, with strong competencies in **MLOps** using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to aligning solutions with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed full-stack applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React** (17–18) to deliver high-performance features in B2B SaaS platforms.
• Designed and implemented **RESTful APIs** and microservices architectures to enhance application scalability and maintainability.
• Managed CI/CD pipelines utilizing **AWS** services such as **Lambda**, **ECS**, and **API Gateway**, ensuring automated testing and efficient deployment workflows.
• Created data models leveraging both **Relational** and **Non-Relational Datastores** (PostgreSQL, MongoDB), optimizing for user access patterns and data integrity.
• Deployed production-grade services in cloud environments, using **AWS** **CloudWatch** for observability and performance management.
• Implemented comprehensive testing strategies with tools like Jest and Cypress to ensure code quality, achieving over **95%** test coverage in critical modules.
• Leveraged **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code, managing and deploying cloud resources efficiently and consistently.
• Optimized application performance through rigorous profiling and adjustments based on system metrics, resulting in improved response times by up to **30%**.
• Integrated **AWS QuickSight** and **dbt** for advanced data analytics and visualization, enhancing decision-making insights from user data.
• Authored scalable solution patterns for cloud-based applications, leading to a **40%** reduction in deployment time and improved service reliability.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and implement best practices across all initiatives, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, significantly enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django).
Leveraged **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to build interactive front-end applications, creating sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels using **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS**.
Engineered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, equipping operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring effective asynchronous communication across critical workflows for payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed data ingestion ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for ingesting financial data from both internal and third-party sources, enabling batch and real-time processing capabilities.
Implemented and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, promoting proactive detection of suspicious activity in compliance with established thresholds based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created and managed **ML** pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, integrating model inference into backend services with **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
Employed **CI/CD** strategies to enhance production observability and ensure seamless deployment processes with automated testing frameworks.

Developed and optimized **microservices** architecture using **Node.js** (**Express**, **Koa**) to enhance backend performance and reliability for a high-demand B2B SaaS environment.
Designed and built **RESTful APIs** ensuring seamless integration with frontend frameworks like **React** and supporting **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** standards to provide a robust user experience.
Implemented efficient **data modeling** strategies with **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases to ensure scalable data storage and fast retrieval within high-traffic applications.
Leveraged **AWS services** such as **Lambda**, **ECS**, and **Fargate** to design cloud-native solutions that facilitated the deployment of services with over **99.9% uptime**.
Utilized **AWS CloudFormation** and **Terraform** for **Infrastructure as Code** (IaC) to automate infrastructure management, contributing to a **30% reduction** in deployment times.
Designed CI/CD pipelines to streamline the development process and enhance productivity, achieving successful deployment rates of over **95%** with minimal rollbacks.
Focused on application performance optimization which led to a **40% increase** in response times for login and data fetching processes.
Conducted automated testing practices that increased code quality and reliability, reducing bug reports by **25%** post-deployment.
Applied **containers** technology (Docker) for consistent development and production environments, enhancing team collaboration and deployment consistency.
Established **production observability** practices using **AWS CloudWatch** for monitoring application health and performance metrics, aiding in proactive issue resolution.
